REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Abductee
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was abducted at a young age and forced to do menial labor on a pirate ship.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Accursed child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was born at the peak of a lunar eclipse. The elders declared HIM a child of darkness brought HIM under their care. HISCAP entire childhood was spent studying the lore and rituals of HIS people - until the day of calling.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Blacksmith's child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME's father owned the blacksmith shop in an run-down old city district. NAME would help HIS father whenever HE could. Later, HIS father took HIM as a blacksmith's apprentice. NAME also took on shooting as a hobby.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Brutal thief
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Growing up in a gang, NAME learned the brutality of the streets. Knowing that showing weakness could be fatal, HE closed HIMself of to others.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Cadet
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born on the planet New China, NAME's father was a police chief and kept extremely strict watch over HIM. NAME had to do military-style drill exercises every day and keep HIS room spotlessly clean, always ready for inspection. HECAP came to abhor violence.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Chess master
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME loved to play chess. HECAP even earned the nickname Bishop for some of HIS craftier moves. HECAP never got into trouble - mostly because HE was good at not getting caught.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Child of drifters
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Ever since HE was very small, NAME had never known a home beyond HIS parent's ship. They were a family of nomads whose meandering provided a constant change of scenery. HISCAP life was often perilous but never dull, and HE inherited HIS parents' wanderlust at a young age.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Child prodigy
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After graduating college at age twelve, NAME devoted HIS life to becoming immortal. However HIS research crossed the line when HE tried to modify HIS body using gene therapy and mechanical augmentation. HECAP was arrested and condemned to a prison planet.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Child soldier
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: War may never change - but the cast of characters does. Born on a violent urbworld, NAME was trained from a young age to fight the wars of others, and became rather good at it.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Clone-farmed
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Clone children are seeded into organic-rich wombvats and rapidly grown in a simmed universe. They're harvested later, sometimes for food, sometimes for organs, sometimes for workers - but they're always called "Disposable."

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Corp student
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was bred to become an executive officer for the large space trading corporation that owned HIS home planet. HISCAP family had been working for that corporation for seven generations. At age six, HE started to study at the corporate academy, where HE learned to become a loyal follower and a ruthless executive.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Corp-bred student
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was bred to become an executive for the space exploration corporation that owned HIS home planet. HISCAP family had been working for that corporation for four generations. At age five, HE enrolled at the corporate academy where HE learned loyalty and ruthlessness. NAME excelled in finding diplomatic solutions where others would need violence.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Dreaded baby
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was found as a baby in a crashed spacecraft. According to the ship's data records, HE invented the nuclear device that powered HIS ship. Apparently, HE also invented the sky and the hamburger, and is said to have spawned a race of tasty golden kittens.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Dreamer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Since HIS father was often away, NAME took on much responsibility around the house. HECAP learned the value of hard work, but never really had a childhood. Every day, NAME dreamed of leaving HIS home and exploring new worlds.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Dreamer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was an expressive child. HECAP sang often, and made friends very easily, be they young or old, male or female. HECAP hated fighting, but when made angry, HE could be dangerous. HISCAP temper was quick.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Drug mule
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Raised in an orphanage, NAME turned towards the gang life at age ten. HECAP was exploited by the local gang as a drug mule to traffic "substance F" across rival gang territory. HECAP took a bullet or two.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Energetic pop idol
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME grew up on a glitterworld, training in rapier arts and singing. HECAP spent several years as an energetic teen pop idol. However, HE decided that the music and modeling industries were not paying HIS enough attention, so HE left.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Fallen prodigy
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was born on a glitterworld falling into chaos. HISCAP father was killed in action. HECAP struggled for a scholarship at Utmaior Academy and had to prove HIS right to be there. A child genius, HE was bullied as a charity case and couldn't make friends with the other kids.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Farm hand
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was born on a farm on a smaller colony world. Everything was taken care of by the few members of the farm, including NAME. This helped HIM build independence, spirit, and a well-rounded character.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Feral child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME and HIS family lived a hard but prosperous lives along with their fellow colonists on a distant rimworld. One day a group of mechanoids attacked, killing everyone aside from Robert. HECAP then lived alone in the desert until a group of raiders found HIM.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Feudal lordling
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME grew up on a feudal world that was part of a multi-planet empire. As the child of a high lord, HE enjoyed many privileges. HECAP learned to maneuver in the both the political landscape and in close quarters combat.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Galactic page
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME served the high admiral of a space fleet. HECAP learned the ways of court, including etiquette and speechcraft. In HIS feudal society, it was considered a great honor to serve a man of such prestige.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Game fanatic
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a fanatical gamer who learned to survive in virtual reality games. Once, while attempting to prove HIS skills in the real world, HE was abducted by a criminal scientist and experimented on. HECAP escaped, but the experience stayed with HIM.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Gang member
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME grew up without parents. HISCAP whole life was spent alone, fighting for survival on the streets. No matter how hard it became to survive, HE never gave up.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Glitterworld nerd
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME loved technology from the day HE was born. HECAP had a mechanoid companion which HE tried to modify when HE was 10. HISCAP obsession with technology meant that HE never appreciated arts or culture.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: G-nome sculptor
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was engineered in a lab as part of the G-nome Project. HECAP was implanted at birth with encyclopedic knowledge of all aspects of xenobiology. The G-nome scientists nicknamed HIM Gizmo and occupied HIM with sculpting. HECAP developed a love of sculpting gnomes and gnome accessories.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Hacker prodigy
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was raised as the only child of wealthy surgeons. After being pressured into accepting a medical apprenticeship, HE snapped. HECAP seized HIS inheritance and went underground to learn how to exploit computer networks. HECAP quickly became one of the most feared hackers on HIS home planet.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: High baroness
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was born as low-ranking royalty in a large imperial family. HECAP was placed In charge of running HIS home planet from an early age, and learned important political and cultural skills in that role.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Indworld urchin
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME grew up on the streets of a world in the early stages of its industrial revolution. HECAP passed HIS days stealing, begging and tinkering with discarded machine scraps, always on the lookout for a way to escape poverty.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Joywire addict
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME's wealthy parents provided everything HE ever wanted. After discovering joywires, HE became obsessed. Once HIS parents realized what happened, they cut HIM off. Uncaring and often violent, HE sought HIS next joywire fix by any means possible.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Killer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a bloodlusting child. Villagers thought HIM the product of a snake demon and human coupling. After watching how HIS human father betrayed and murdered HIS mother, HE longed to see how many more humans HE could get to fall into HIS hands.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Labor camp orphan
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME lost HIS parents in an industrial accident and grew up in an orphans' labor camp. The camp overseers worked their charges mercilessly - but at least HE was clothed and fed.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Midworld geek
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME grew up in a quiet suburban neighborhood. HECAP was never a master of social interaction, but HIS interest in computers blossomed into a true talent at an early age.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Midworld sketcher
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was born into a loving but poor family. HECAP discovered HE had an artistic talent which HE inherited from HIS father. HISCAP mother taught HIM the benefits of hard work and determination. As HE grew older, NAME developed a fascination with technology and military history.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Militant child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME's military family forced HIM to train in hand-to-hand combat and fighting tactics. In HIS own time, HE built small inventions. This sharpened HIS mind.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Military recruit
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was born on a midworld run by an intensely militaristic dictatorship. From a young age, HE was trained to be a good soldier. They taught HIM how to use a gun and how to fight with melee weapons.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Nerd
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was curious about everything. While other kids played tag in the suburbs of their industrial city, NAME read every book HE could find about technology, robots, and weapons - whatever looked coolest. HISCAP strong French accent kept HIM from making real friends.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Officer cadet
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: From a young age, NAME trained to be a leader of men. HECAP enrolled in the Vanu Defense College when HE was still young, and became proficient with a range of weapons and survival techniques.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Orphan
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Left alone in the world without parents, NAME did the best HE could to adapt. Having to take care both of HIMself and younger kids at the orphanage, HE learned a lot about humans and how to interact with them.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Pickpocket
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Orphaned and abandoned on the tumultuous streets of HIS polluted, teeming homeworld, NAME survived by deft hand and fleet foot. A natural born thief and trickster, HE rose to prominence early, running the notorious and violent urchin gang "Doomben Rats."

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Pit gladiator
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was enslaved as a child and forced to fight creatures and other people in an underground fighting arena. HECAP showed an affinity for the sport, and eventually bought HIS own freedom. However, HIS time in the pits never brought HIM much intellectual stimulation.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Plague prodigy
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME's childhood was cut short when a mysterious plague hit HIS homeworld. HECAP watched HIS friends die, and HIS compassion for humanity died with them. In its place a new thirst for knowledge emerged.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Power-mad scholar
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: "Knowledge is power." These words sparked something within NAME, and came to form HIS core drive. When not entombed within libraries, HE would take things apart to see first-hand how they worked, with little regard for the border between mechanical and organic.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Professional gamer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was obsessed with video games since HIS hands were big enough to grip a joystick. HECAP achieved middling finishes in several local tournaments during the 16-bit era. Nobody noticed when HE retired early in HIS teenage years.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Project subject
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was picked by government agents for the mysterious "Frame Project." Due to memory blockages, however, HE remembers very little about this project or its true agenda - only that there were few survivors.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Pyro assistant
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: On an industrial world, NAME learned early that if HE wanted to eat, HE had to work. So work HE did. Kids fit in places adults can't, and where HE was from, the safety laws were quite flexible. HECAP was always a bit of a pyromaniac, and was banned from the kitchen after an unfortunate incident.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Rebel student
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME grew up in a modest but privileged family who encouraged HIM to play chess and shoot skeet at a young age. As a bored student, HE found joy in challenging HIS teachers about the contradictions between HIS planet's official values and their government's policies.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Reclusive prodigy
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Growing up on a flourishing glitterworld afforded NAME the chance to fully devote HIMself to HIS studies. Having taken a keen interest in genetic modification and neural augmentation from a young age, HE had little time (or desire) for a regular childhood.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Rich kid
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME grew up on a midworld with loving parents, a cute pet and a lot of money - but no friends. HECAP was always told by HIS father that "those peasants just want your money." So, HE spent most of HIS time alone, or fighting other kids.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Science prodigy
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was top of HIS class in chemistry, physics, exobiology, astronomy and opera. An unfortunate lab accident left HIS with a deathly fear of fire.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Scout
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was in a scout troop on a midworld. HECAP learned many survival skills including how to thrive in the outdoors and how to tend to basic wounds.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Shooting coma
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME fell into a coma at a young age and spent years dreaming about shooting. When HE awoke, HE was useless at most tasks - but HE could aim pretty well.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Sole survivor
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME's entire tribe was wiped out by a mysterious disease. Found alone and adopted by another band, HE never became close with the other tribe members. HECAP preferred to stay away from HIS new home, wandering the woods and tending the animals.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Space smuggler
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME's parents used HIM to help smuggle contraband between a cluster of rim worlds. Aided by HIS small size, NAME became very adept at carrying out HIS parents' missions, learning weaponry, negotiations, and most of all smuggling.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Speeder racer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was the child of a fern farmer in the towering forests of Khalderia. HECAP found HIS first love in speeder racing, zipping in and out of the massive canopies and gorgeous vistas of HIS homeworld. The seedy underworld of racing also forced HIM to learn to defend HIMself with a quick word or a quicker shot.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Station whelp
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME spent HIS childhood as a penniless orphan living on a space station. HECAP managed to scrape by doing filthy jobs and stealing. HECAP became so violent due to poor treatment by HIS "betters" that HE was banished from the station, just to be picked up by space pirates.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Street kid
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Growing up on the streets of a desert planet, NAME's only friend was a dog named Rest. The pair scraped by, finding just enough food to survive. When HE was 13 years old, an interplanetary criminal group took HIM under their wing.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Street urchin
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After running away from home, NAME had to live on the streets. HECAP grew up fast, and learned early that HE had to figure out how to fool people into connecting with HIM.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Super soldier
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME's government ran an experimental super-soldier development program. They kidnapped thousands of infants, conditioned their minds with drugs and machines, and trained them to fight. Most infants died, but NAME did not. HECAP killed HIS first man at age six, and was fighting in field operations not long after.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Tech enthusiast
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME had all the latest gadgets as a child. HECAP spent all HIS time playing games with AIs instead of with other children. HECAP always felt awkward around new people.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Tech-head
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Standing on the ship hull with HIS father in a child-size EVA suit, NAME loved space from a young age. HECAP was put in a Civil Academics Program. While pretending to be like HIS father, HE spent HIS time taking care of plants in HIS messy room. HISCAP nickname was given for HIS love of circles.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Toxic child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Growing up on an Industrial planet, NAME started working in a chemical plant at the age of six. Years of exposure to industrial toxins left HIM physically and mentally scarred. HECAP eventually blew up the facility and escaped the planet in a stolen cargo ship.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Tragic twin
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was drawn to the water from an early age, and spent as much of HIS time as possible in and around it. HISCAP twin became trapped during a dive and did not survive. NAME never returned to the water again.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Trainee alchemist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME grew up on a medieval world. HECAP learned the basics of alchemy and medicine in one the few monastic schools on HIS planet.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Tribal thunderer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Years ago, NAME's tribe stumbled upon an abandoned gun vault. Believing the weapons to be sacred gifts, the shaman would select a child born under superstitious circumstances and assign them the honour of bearing one to defend the village. NAME is such a child.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: War child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME's parents were drafted into a civil war in HIS home country. Growing up surrounded by fighting and death, HE became well-accustomed to tragedy and tough as nails. HISCAP expressive side, however, never developed.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: War refugee
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: A war broke on out NAME's home planet. Gathering what little food and belongings they could, NAME and HIS father stole a ship and escaped into space.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Wasteland wanderer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born into a wealthy family on a desert world, NAME was cast out after a hired attack squad destroyed HIS ancestral home. HECAP managed to hide in a cooling duct beneath HIS family's villa. Vowing revenge against the killers and whomever had hired them, Lucas struck out into the wasteland, alone.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Winerunner
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Abandoned by HIS parents, NAME was raised by the monks of the Novo Mosteiro dos Jerónimos monastery on Aracena VI. The monks taught HIM discipline and hard work. In return, HE would go into the city and "acquire" exotic wines for the monks' nightly tastings.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Wolf pack member
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was discarded by HIS family. Raised by wolves, HE ran, hunted, and defended HIS pack. HECAP learned to fight efficiently by tooth and claw. HECAP also learned brutally effective primal hunting strategies.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Young psychologist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was born and raised on a poor midworld, in the front passenger seat of HIS mother's cab. Watching pedestrians and listening to the taxi passengers all day long, HE soon became very good at figuring out someone's real purpose.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Youth delinquent
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was the only child of celebrity sommeliers. HISCAP parents expected HIM to take up the family profession, but after HIS third admission to a youth detention center, this career path became unlikely. While in detention, NAME became skilled at making shanks and developed an interest in orinthology.
